movie.title: Boys of Abu Ghraib
movie.description_intro: An American soldier deployed at Abu Ghraib finds himself behind the walls of the infamous Hard Site, where he develops a secret friendship with an Iraqi detainee.
movie.description_full: An American soldier deployed at Abu Ghraib finds himself behind the walls of the infamous Hard Site, where he develops a secret friendship with an Iraqi detainee.

movies.title: The Letter Writer
movies.summary: A fiercely rebellious teen embarks on a mission to track down her secret admirer after receiving an inspirational letter from someone who seems to know her even better than she knows herself. Maggie Fuller has never felt as if she lived up to her parents' expectations, so when she receives a flattering letter in the mail, she's determined to uncover the identity of the sender. Upon meeting the stranger who had such kind words to say about her, Maggie realizes just how many mysteries life truly holds. As her life slowly changes, as the old Maggy slowly slips into the shoes of the new Maggy, another drastic change of events arise. The new Maggy goes head-to-head with the new problems life brought her, as she is no longer the old Maggy Fuller. Life tests her, wanting her to prove how the letter changed the old Maggy Fuller. She doesn't fail, though.

movies.title: Old Joy
movies.summary: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.description_full: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.synopsis: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.

movies.title: To End All Wars
movies.summary: A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately they find true freedom by forgiving their enemies. Based on the true story of Ernest Gordon.
movies.description_full: A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately they find true freedom by forgiving their enemies. Based on the true story of Ernest Gordon.

movies.title: The Soul of America
movies.summary: Present-day, fraught political reality by exploring historical challenges of the past.
movies.description_full: Present-day, fraught political reality by exploring historical challenges of the past.
